title: Sonic Mega Collection Plus - [PS3] (PS2 classics) 4.21+
description:
Sonic Mega Collection Plus converted into a ps2 classic for ps3.

Within contains the sonic pkg file and exdata folder with the game's rap file.
Works with Rebug 4.21+ and Rogero 4.41.


To install.

If you already have a ps2 classics installed 
all you have to do is install.

1. Install sonic.

2. Place "exdata" folder on flash drive.

3. Put flash drive in the right usb port.

4. Create a new user and name it "aa".

5. Run reactpsn and do not press any buttons. (ps3 should do a soft reboot)

6. Play the game.
